name: iris-jupyter-server
displayName: Jupyter Server Proxy for InterSystems IRIS
description: Run a local Jupyter Server acting as a proxy for InterSystems IRIS servers defined in InterSystems Server Manager

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.package:win32-x64: npm run package-prep && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('./intersystems-iris-native/bin/winx64/', './dist/', { recursive: true, filter: (f) => !f.endsWith('irisnative.node') })" && vsce package --target win32-x64
scripts.package:darwin-x64: npm run package-prep && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('./intersystems-iris-native/bin/macx64/', './dist/', { recursive: true, filter: (f) => !f.endsWith('irisnative.node') })" && vsce package --target darwin-x64
scripts.package:darwin-arm64: npm run package-prep && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('./intersystems-iris-native/bin/macos/', './dist/', { recursive: true, filter: (f) => !f.endsWith('irisnative.node') })" && vsce package --target darwin-arm64
scripts.package:linux-x64: npm run package-prep && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('./intersystems-iris-native/bin/lnxubuntux64/', './dist/', { recursive: true, filter: (f) => !f.endsWith('irisnative.node') })" && vsce package --target linux-x64
